com.b2international.snowowl.core.validation.issue

Interface ValidationIssueDetailExtension

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SnomedValidationIssueDetailExtension

    public interface ValidationIssueDetailExtension
    Since:
    6.4

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void extendIssues(BranchContext context, java.util.Collection<ValidationIssue> issues)
      Customize each issue by adding new fields to them via the ValidationIssue.setDetails(String, Object), ValidationIssue.setAffectedComponentLabels(java.util.List) methods to support domain specific searching on it later via the ValidationIssueSearchRequestBuilder.filterByDetails(java.util.Map) and ValidationIssueSearchRequestBuilder.filterByAffectedComponentLabel(String) methods.
      java.lang.String getToolingId() 
      void prepareQuery(Expressions.ExpressionBuilder queryBuilder, Options options)
      Prepares the given queryBuilder with domain specific filters on fields mainly added by the extendIssues(BranchContext, Collection) method during issue indexing.

    • Method Detail

      • prepareQuery

        void prepareQuery(Expressions.ExpressionBuilder queryBuilder,
                  Options options)
        Prepares the given queryBuilder with domain specific filters on fields mainly added by the extendIssues(BranchContext, Collection) method during issue indexing.
        Parameters:
        queryBuilder -
        options -

      • extendIssues

        void extendIssues(BranchContext context,
                  java.util.Collection<ValidationIssue> issues)
        Customize each issue by adding new fields to them via the ValidationIssue.setDetails(String, Object), ValidationIssue.setAffectedComponentLabels(java.util.List) methods to support domain specific searching on it later via the ValidationIssueSearchRequestBuilder.filterByDetails(java.util.Map) and ValidationIssueSearchRequestBuilder.filterByAffectedComponentLabel(String) methods.
        Parameters:
        context - - the context to use for extension
        issues - - the issues to extend

      • getToolingId

        java.lang.String getToolingId()
        Returns:
        the tooling identifier
